Class RoomSizeSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.view.UI.GUI.controller.RoomSizeSceneController
public class RoomSizeSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
Controls the scene of the choice of the room size

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void choice​(int number)
    Sets the room size calling the turnDown method
    void displayButtons()
    Displays all the button with a transition
    void img2OnMouseClicked()
    Called if the user clicks on the image of 2 player and sets the room size to 2 and sends a VC_RoomSizeResponseGameEvent to the server
    void img2OnMouseEntered()
    Sets the effect on the mouse entering the 2 player image
    void img2OnMouseExited()
    Removes the effect on the 2 player image
    void img3OnMouseClicked()
    Called if the user clicks on the image of 3 player and sets the room size to 3 and sends a VC_RoomSizeResponseGameEvent to the server
    void img3OnMouseEntered()
    Sets the effect on the mouse entering the 3 player image
    void img3OnMouseExited()
    Removes the effect on the 3 player image
    void initialize()
    Initialize the scene displaying the buttons
    void setGui​(GUI gui)  
    private void turnDown​(int choice)
    Sets the room size to the choice passed as parameter sending a VC_RoomSizeResponseGameEvent to the server

    • turnDown

      private void turnDown​(int choice)
      Sets the room size to the choice passed as parameter sending a VC_RoomSizeResponseGameEvent to the server
      Parameters:
      choice - the size of the room created by the player

    • choice

      private void choice​(int number)
      Sets the room size calling the turnDown method
      Parameters:
      number - number chosen by the user
